meanings.definition: To travel regularly or frequently around the world.
meanings.sent1: She globetrotted to many countries last year.
meanings.sent2: He globetrotted for his job, visiting different continents.
meanings.sent3: The cat globetrotted around the house, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: Her mind globetrotted through memories of past adventures.
meanings.sent5: The book described how the character globetrotted through time and space.

meanings.definition: Having traveled regularly or frequently around the world.
meanings.sent1: The globetrotted explorer shared stories of her adventures.
meanings.sent2: The globetrotted couple displayed souvenirs from their trips.
meanings.sent3: The globetrotted suitcase was covered in travel stickers.
meanings.sent4: His globetrotted experiences gave him a broad perspective.
meanings.sent5: The globetrotted artist's work was influenced by diverse cultures.
